name: Comet Eggs
description: Comet Eggs have become the latest trend in interstellar haute cuisine. Discriminating chefs everywhere choose Comet Eggs for their striking orange yolks, which beautify everything from pastries and pastas to soufflés and sauces.
Comet Eggs transform ordinary recipes and old favorites into something truly out of this world!

blocks.name: Comet Eggs
text: What makes Comet Eggs such a striking shade of intergalactic orange? It’s not JUST that they are produced closer to the sun.

The answer is carotenoids. Carotenoids may rhyme with asteroids, but they are actually naturally occurring yellow-orange pigments found right here on Earth. (Think carrots and sea kelp.) The carotenoids beta carotene, lutein and xanthophyll (found in our egg yolks) are all linked to eye health. Studies reveal that beta carotene also improves cognitive function.

The presence of these natural wonders make Comet Eggs the blazing sun on your breakfast plate and the universally superior choice for your family table. (And ensure that our super-smart chickens don’t need eye glasses.)
Comet Eggs have 0 trans fat, 6 grams of protein and only 70 calories per serving, so you can start your day the FUN way with delicious, nutritious eggs from Chino Valley Ranchers!

Comet Eggs have become the latest trend in interstellar haute cuisine. Discriminating chefs everywhere choose Comet Eggs for their striking orange yolks, which beautify everything from pastries and pastas to soufflés and sauces.
Comet Eggs transform ordinary recipes and old favorites into something truly out of this world!

moreOptions.name: Pasture Raised Organic
moreOptions.description: Our pasture raised organic eggs are delicious! These eggs come exclusively from hens who enjoy the many benefits of sunshine, fresh air and water, and lots of room to roam on family farms.

moreOptions.name: Pasture Raised
